intension: Design a business card for a garden cleaning service called HABAC CLEANERS INC. with the contact information of Telma Habac. The design should feature an illustration of a leaf to emphasize the gardening aspect of the business.
globalcaption: The image features a pink background with a logo and contact information for Telma Habac, a cleaning professional. The logo is positioned towards the left side of the image, while the contact information is displayed in a list format on the right side. The list includes her email address, phone number, and website URL. The overall design is clean and organized, showcasing the professionalism of Telma Habac's cleaning services.
keywords: garden, cleaner, clean, gardening, tool, illustration, information, contacts, service, business card, leaf, pink

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a pink background with a black and white design. The design consists of a spider web pattern, which is a common symbol of Halloween. The spider web is positioned in the upper left corner of the image, covering a significant portion of the background. The pink color of the background contrasts with the black and white design, creating a visually striking scene
